      • plant

        public void plant(Garden g,
                  Plantable p)
           throws NoRoomInGardenException
        Method which plants a plant in a garden.
        Parameters:
        g - Garden where the plant is to be planted.
        p - Plantable to be planted.
        Throws:
        NoRoomInGardenException - Exception that is thrown in case no more room is unavailble for a certain type of plants.

      • waterPlants

        public void waterPlants(Garden g)

        Parameters:
        g - Garden where plants are watered.
